attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, the undersigned, urge the Prime Minister to re-introduce the legal practise of Trial by Trebuchet, where criminal miscreants are hurled from a trebuchet into a moat.

If they drown or are fatally crushed, then they are deemed innocent and posthumously pardoned.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
